trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There was one other sighting in Lafayette on or around July 24th 2008
Summary: This sighting is the exact same as I posted about last year. Small tiny little flashing white lights going all ove the sky--then meeting up and flashing bright orange glow very large very bright followed by audible sound.--then very far apart suddenly.
divs: sighting detailsi was arriving home at ecactly 10:20pm est last night at my home on the edge of town lafayette indiana. my home is located right off us hwy 26 headed towards rossville in. i wasn't even looking at the sky--was paying attention to the road and very noticably were 3 large bright orange spheres. i said "here we go again"--it was the same as i reported to mufon last year. 3 large balls of orange\yellow color, followed by a plane like noise (fairly loud)--and then nothingness---then separately very far apart--like opposite areas of your vision you see very very small white flashing lights. last time someone posted saying that it is a refueling exercise at grisson airforce base in peru indiana--and i could believe that however the speed that they disappear and reappear is like nothing i have ever seen with even military aircraft.
